thread.section_title: Ticketmaster Resale Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Ticketmaster Resale | resale.ticketmaster.com.au
thread.title: Belinda

author: Belinda
title: Belinda
text: Whilst it was an excellent system, and I was very pleased with the ease of sale for tickets that in all honesty were purchased for people who didn't end up coming to the show with me - I'm appalled, in line with society at large, at the scalping prices that tickets are going for on your site (and in the greater market) and would suggest that in the spirit of being a good corporate citizen, your business should look after its reputation, and take steps to ensure that scalpers (and lets be real, that has to be, in the main, the greatest seller group you'd be hosting here) can't steal the shirt off the music lovers back. Capping the price they can sell at? I'm not sure what the answer is - but whatever it is, steps need to be taken - as the whole experience is leaving an increasingly bitter taste in the punters' mouths. Thank you for the opportunity to feed back.
